The Domes Fundraiser


About

The Domes Project at Song of the Morning Yoga Retreat was a fundraiser in September 2021 raising money to enhance the non-profit's Domes building complex. I developed a detailed graphic of the Domes for a custom enamel pin that went out to all donors upon meeting the $20,000 goal.

Role:

  • Graphic Design
  • Marketing

Tools:

  • Illustrator

Design

An iconic building on Song of the Morning's property, it was important to show the detailed geometric features of the Domes within the design.

Due to manufacturing color limits, isolating the graphic into 5 key colors required creativity in expressing the dimensions of these rounded buildings.
